import React, {useState} from 'react' import './Testinomials.css' import {testimonialsData} from '../../data/testimonialsData.js' import leftArrow from '../../assets/leftArrow.png' import rightArrow from '../../assets/rightArrow.png' const Testinomials = () => { const [selected, setSelected]=useState(0); return (
Testinomials WHAT THEY SAY ABOUT US {testimonialsData[selected].review} {testimonialsData[selected].name} {" "} -{" "} {testimonialsData[selected].status}
img
) } export default Testinomials
